result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marlon Hernandez Ordonez

defendant.name: Hernandez Ordonez, Marlon
defendant.address: 1136 Morraine View Dr. Apt. 203, Madison, WI 53719

records.addlTxt: This is the notice of hearing that was given to defendant at jail - it is incorrect. New notice was mailed by JA.
Not possess or consume controlled substances without a valid Rx. Not possess drug paraphernalia. Standard felony conditions. Must provide an updated address prior to release.
Return date on December 20, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Pre-trial conference on December 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.

1:30 PM Defendant Marlon Hernandez Ordonez appeared by video, in custody at Columbia County Jail.  Attorney Allison J Borsheim appeared by video for Marlon Hernandez Ordonez.  Prosecuting attorney Peggy A. Crooks-Mishacoff in court for the State of Wisconsin. Interpreter Alejandra Klaric present in courtroom, sworn. Court will recall the case to allow the interpreter to read complaint to victim. 1:47 Case recalled. Appearances the same. Waived reading of complaint. Advisement of rights. Bond recommendations. Court set $5000.00 signature bond. Not possess or consume controlled substances without a valid Rx. Not possess drug paraphernalia. Standard felony conditions.  Must provide valid address prior to release. Time limits for preliminary hearing waived. 1:52 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 9, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Return date scheduled for December 20, 2022 at 10:00 am.
